MajorClaims.Text: arts are supposed to be included in the government's investment as well
public services and facilities are an integral part of the government expenditure
the authorities should also respect the value of arts which are individually and socially advantageous

Claims.Text: public services and facilities should be given adequate attention by the authorities to maintain social stability
arts should by no means been disregarded by the government
funding arts is beneficial to the local cultural and economic development

Premises.Text: the government should give priority to public services and facilities
the government plays the role of a leader among citizens, which should discharge the responsibility of making optimal use of the tax money to keep society safe and stable
public services such as education system or medical care can meet people's basic demand of survival, security and knowledge, thus making them feel comfortable, which can lower the crime rate
arts can enrich people's cultural lives
Currently, people are increasingly occupied with their work and studies due to the stiff competition
they require various entertainment such as music, movies or books to them ease their minds and release pressure
Without arts, people would be at risk of suffering psychological problems
Cultural heritage constitutes an essential part of arts

preserving local arts may promote the preservation of the local cultural heritage, which not only helps the local people have a sense of belonging but also contributes to the booming local tourism industry
arts serve cultural and economic purposes
